title: The Law Within
description: "Two things fill the mind with ever-increasing wonder and awe, the more often and the more intensely the mind of thought is drawn to the starry heavens above me and the moral law within me." -Immanuel Kant What if you invented a machine that read the states of every synapse in the brain? What if you invented a machine that could control the state of every synapse in the brain? What if someone who doesn't believe the world exists tried to take that machine?
author: Seth Weisberg
